entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS THIS EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY AND BRISK
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 19
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
